welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seeheim-Jugenheim, a charming town nestled in the heart of Germany known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mannheim Airport, primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the FRA-WiFi network and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Base Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
